plugin.name: swagger-codegen (maven-plugin)
plugin.description: maven plugin to build modules from swagger codegen

mojo.description: Goal which generates client/server code from a swagger json/yaml definition.

parameter.name: addCompileSourceRoot
parameter.description: Add the output directory to the project as a source root, so that the generated java types are compiled and included in the project artifact.

parameter.name: additionalProperties
parameter.description: A map of additional properties that can be referenced by the mustache templates

parameter.name: apiPackage
parameter.description: The package to use for generated api objects/classes

parameter.name: artifactId
parameter.description: artifactId in generated pom.xml

parameter.name: artifactVersion
parameter.description: artifact version in generated pom.xml

parameter.name: auth
parameter.description: Adds authorization headers when fetching the swagger definitions remotely. ' Pass in a URL-encoded string of name:header with a comma separating multiple values

parameter.name: configOptions
parameter.description: A map of language-specific parameters as passed with the -c option to the command line

parameter.name: configurationFile
parameter.description: Path to separate json configuration file.

parameter.name: generateApiDocumentation
parameter.description: Generate the api documentation

parameter.name: generateApis
parameter.description: Generate the apis

parameter.name: generateApiTests
parameter.description: Generate the api tests

parameter.name: generateModelDocumentation
parameter.description: Generate the model documentation

parameter.name: generateModels
parameter.description: Generate the models

parameter.name: generateModelTests
parameter.description: Generate the model tests

parameter.name: generateSupportingFiles
parameter.description: Generate the supporting files

parameter.name: gitRepoId
parameter.description: Git repo ID, e.g. swagger-codegen.

parameter.name: gitUserId
parameter.description: Git user ID, e.g. swagger-api.

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.description: groupId in generated pom.xml

parameter.name: ignoreFileOverride
parameter.description: Sets an optional ignoreFileOverride path

parameter.name: importMappings
parameter.description: A map of classes and the import that should be used for that class

parameter.name: inputSpec
parameter.description: Location of the swagger spec, as URL or file.

parameter.name: instantiationTypes
parameter.description: A map of types and the types they should be instantiated as

parameter.name: invokerPackage
parameter.description: The package to use for the generated invoker objects

parameter.name: language
parameter.description: Client language to generate.

parameter.name: languageSpecificPrimitives
parameter.description: A map of additional language specific primitive types

parameter.name: library
parameter.description: Sets the library

parameter.name: modelNamePrefix
parameter.description: Sets the prefix for model enums and classes

parameter.name: modelNameSuffix
parameter.description: Sets the suffix for model enums and classes

parameter.name: modelPackage
parameter.description: The package to use for generated model objects/classes

parameter.name: modelsToGenerate
parameter.description: A comma separated list of models to generate. All models is the default.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Location of the output directory.

parameter.name: removeOperationIdPrefix
parameter.description: Specifies if the existing files should be overwritten during the generation.

parameter.name: reservedWordsMappings
parameter.description: A map of reserved names and how they should be escaped

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip the execution.

parameter.name: skipOverwrite
parameter.description: Specifies if the existing files should be overwritten during the generation.

parameter.name: supportingFilesToGenerate
parameter.description: A comma separated list of models to generate. All models is the default.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Folder containing the template files.

parameter.name: typeMappings
parameter.description: A map of swagger spec types and the generated code types to use for them

parameter.name: withXml
parameter.description: Generate the api documentation

mojo.description: Display help information on swagger-codegen-maven-plugin. Call mvn swagger-codegen:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.
